Title: Plumber Cracked
Plot: Cate takes Paige out for some drinks, hoping that she'll spill some information about Ryan's ex-girlfriend, Julia. At the same time, Ryan joins Baze, Jamie and Math for a guys' night out, but Baze is depressed about the current state of his relationship with Emma. Meanwhile, Lux and Eric take a big risk with their relationship, which threatens Lux's friendship with Tasha.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Writer: Patti Carr, Lara Olsen, Liz Tigelaar
GuestStars: Reggie Austin (Jamie), Ksenia Solo (Tasha), Shaun Sipos (Eric Daniels), Arielle Kebbel (Paige Thomas), Emma Caulfield (Emma Bradshaw), Landon Liboiron (Sam Bradshaw)
